trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Timers.Timer.Elapsed"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Timers.Timer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que irá processar a <xref href="System.Timers.Timer.Elapsed"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Timers.Timer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you create an ElapsedEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the <xref:System.Timers.Timer.Elapsed?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria um delegado ElapsedEventHandler, identifique o método que irá processar a <xref:System.Timers.Timer.Elapsed?displayProperty=fullName>eventos.</xref:System.Timers.Timer.Elapsed?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o processador de eventos, adicione uma instância do delegado para o evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os delegados do processador de eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
